text: I'll Stay with You may refer to: ==Songs== *"I'll Stay with You", a song by Beth Hart from Leave the Light On *"I'll Stay with You", a song by Luna Sea, B-side of "Limit" *"I'll Stay with You", a song by Russell Morris from A Thousand Suns and Almost Frantic *"I'll Stay with You", a song by New Order from Lost Sirens *"I'll Stay with You", a song from the soundtrack of There Goes the Bride ==Other uses== * I'll Stay with You (film) or Ich bleib' bei Dir, a 1931 German romantic comedy film
title: I'll Stay with You
